function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of viral strains in human cell lines.","Impact":"Potential for accidental release or contamination of the surrounding environment with infectious viral particles.","Mitigation":"Strict containment protocols and biosafety measures during propagation and handling of viral strains.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, negative pressure rooms, and personal protective equipment (PPE).","People":"Laboratory personnel and individuals in the vicinity of the laboratory.","Owner":"Laboratory management and biosafety officers."},{"Description":"Generation and exposure of viral aerosols in an aerosol irradiation chamber.","Impact":"Risk of aerosolized virus particles escaping the chamber and posing a threat to individuals in the surrounding area.","Mitigation":"Use of sealed and controlled aerosol chambers, strict operational protocols, and regular monitoring of chamber conditions.","Technologies":"Sealed aerosol chambers, air filtration systems, and real-time monitoring devices.","People":"Operators of the aerosol chamber and individuals in the vicinity of the chamber.","Owner":"Research facility management and biosafety officers."}]}
